programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep41
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep914915
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep711
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep487
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep1112
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep41
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep914915
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep711
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3413
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48174818
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep395396
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1894
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep32
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idols memory.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xus life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Chas The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Duel Of The Century
programme.desc: A duel has been arranged at the Forbidden City between two formidable swordsmen of the martial world, Ye Gu Cheng and Xi Men Chui Xue. Lu Xiao Feng smells something fishy about the duel as the two swordsmen never met and do not have any conflicts. He decides to investigate more with Hua Man Lou, and eventually uncovers some hidden conspiracies

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the masters granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: Melody Of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, M. Sasikumar, Shamna Kasim, Mahima Nambiar, Sanusha, Inder Kumar & Others

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Movie, Starring, Vijay, Samantha Akkineni, Kajal Aggarwal, Nithya Menen, S. J. Surya & Others

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Tamil Fantasy Comedy Film, Starring, Aadhi, Nikki Galrani, Anandaraj, Ramdoss & Daniel Annie Pope

programme.title: Varappogum 24 Manikkul
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Eesha Rebba; Satyadev Kancharana, Sriram, Ganesh Venkatraman & Others

programme.title: Kaateri
programme.desc: Tamil comedy Horror film, Starring - Vaibhav, Sonam Bajwa, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, Aathmika

programme.desc: Tamil Comedy horror film, Starring, Srikanth, Raai Laxmi

programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Film, ' Mammootty Manju Warrier Sreenath Bhasi Nikhila Vimal Saniya Iyyappan Jagadish Madhupal Baby Monica & Others

programme.title: Kuttram 23
programme.desc: Tamil crime thriller film, Starring, Arun Vijay, Mahima Nambiar, Thambi Ramaiah, Vamsi Krishna, Vijayakumar & Others

programme.title: Sethupathi
programme.desc: Sethupathy features VIJAY SETHUPATHY & RAMYA NAMBEESAN. It is directed by S.A.Arunkumar & composed by Nivas K Prasanna. It received positive reviews from critics and was a commercial success

programme.title: Kanaa

programme.desc: Buggy Out - After winning a Sumo Slammers Champion belt, Ben returns to the Rustbucket to find his prize in the arms of Kevin, but when his rival hijacks the Rustbuggy instead, our hero must stop at nothing to get back what's rightfully his!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Introducing Kevin 11 - At a local swap meet, Ben instead sets his sights on a Sumo Slammer collectible, but when Kevin takes it for himself, our hero must get it back by overcoming Kevin's secret weapon: an 11th alien!

programme.desc: Four By Four - During their visit to Twin City, Ben and Gwen sign up for some Laser Town awesomeness, but when Ben is teamed up with Kevin, the two must overcome their differences if they are to end up on top!

programme.desc: Cirque Us - After saving a State University Alumni ribbon cutting ceremony, Ben becomes the guest of honor at the upcoming Gala, but when the cirque entertainment turns out to be Zombozo-in-disguise, Ben must not only defeat the evil clown but his mysterious new sidekick: Pirouette!

programme.desc: I Wish He Were Still Here - When Daniel and Ruby OReilly move to the orchard home theyve inherited from Daniels eccentric uncle, the place seems inhospitable - until Ruby makes a discovery that changes everything: a magic well that feeds her cryptic visions of unfulfilled wishes.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep2
programme.desc: I Wish I Knew Where To Start - A wish involving a librarian, a treasure map, and a new perspective all help Ruby discover that her love of helping others comes from her mom, who passed away a year ago. While Ruby faces the difficulty of talking about her past, Daniel struggles to overcome small-town gossip and his familys bad reputation.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep3
programme.desc: I Wish I Could Walk With Her - Ruby gets an intimidating wish about an extended Emerald family, rife with secrets and surprises. Will she and her friends work up the courage to grant it? Meanwhile, Daniel gets to work on the orchard and discovers a key to the past.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep4
programme.desc: I Wish She Would Trust Me - A wish about trust causes a serious trust issue between Daniel and Ruby, too. Meanwhile, Daniel learns secrets about his dad that he never knew.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep5
programme.desc: I Wish I Got The Credit I Deserve - While Daniel struggles to understand his daughters new vocation, Ruby embarks on a scientific wish that helps bring father and daughter to a meeting of the minds.

programme.desc: A 50-something writer in a mid-existential crisis impulsively adopts a collie. The bond between him and the dog transforms in meaningful, unexpected ways.

programme.desc: Peebles' Pet Shop Of Terrible Terrors! - Scooby and the gang meet Wanda Sykes.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Scooby Of A Thousand Faces! - When a marble statue comes to life at a museum in Greece our gang is caught between a braying minotaur and a sword-wielding Wonder Woman!

programme.desc: Ollie Ollie In-Come Free! - Our mystery solving gang agrees to help Ricky Gervais with a haunted antique Egyptian statue of a cat.

programme.desc: The Cursed Cabinet Of Professor Madds Markson! - The gang spends one night in the haunted Savannah Hotel.

programme.desc: Space Station Scooby! - Neil deGrasse Tyson gets trapped on a Space Station.

programme.desc: Now You Sia, Now You Don't! - When Daphne gets a call from her good friend singer-songwriter Sia the gang finds themselves in a mystery involving an evil demon ghost.

programme.desc: The Nightmare Ghost Of Psychic U! - The gang gets lost in the Pocono Mountains of Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep15

programme.desc: The Sword, The Fox And The Scooby Doo! - When our mystery solving gang is driving in Japan they are stopped by none-other than famous actor Mark Hamill.

programme.desc: A rescue pilot and his estranged wife embark on a treacherous journey to save their daughter after a catastrophic earthquake.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer - The Lion is named King of the Forest now he has his medal of courage. Will his trek over water, darkness and spiders be too much for this scaredy cat? Or will he learn the real meaning of courage?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ojo The Unlucky - While making cookies Dorothy accidentally pours the Potion of Life into the mixing bowl, causing disaster! Dorothy must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lion's Share - A love magnet is a great Valentine's Day gift but it magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy, overwhelming her. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Rules Of Attraction - Dorothy and the gang take Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse. But too late they realise the origins of his name and they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Brain Power Of Love - Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices after playfully calling out 'jinx!' Now they must travel to the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Jinxed - The Scarecrow just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker, Patchwork Girl. So Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rise Of The Nome King - The Nome King tricks Dorothy into using the Magic Magnifying Glass on him, and once he's big enough, he makes himself a giant who can take over Oz. So Dorothy will have to make everything else big!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep13
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally - Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey, who has run away from home. Dorothy feels sorry for the monkey and is determined to get him his second wing so she asks for Ozma's help.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Wand-Erful - The Good Witch loses her wand and Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto to 'fetch', to find it. Wilhelmina gets the wand first, but can Toto remember to 'fetch' or will his mistake come in handy?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep15
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover - Wilhelmina is mad she's been left out of a slumber party and tries to ruin it by creating a giant Pillow Monster. But the Pillow Monster attacks the party, and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lion Catches A Bug - Lion has caught a 'bug,' so Ozma shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow so they can enter his ear and remove the bug. With the bug gone, Dorothy inspires Lion to protect the Emerald Forest!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Tik Tok And Tin Man - Tin Man worries that Tik Tok will replace him as the mechanical man of the group. Tin Man decides that he should leave, but Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion must convince him that he can't be replaced.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep18
programme.desc: If I Only Had Some Brawn - Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical 'Get Strong Quick' shirt that makes him a beefy hunk - but at the price of his brain-power.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Beast Royales - The Beasts Royale are going to perform but Wilhelmina is their number one fan and kidnaps them so they can only play for her! The gang must come to the rescue and get the band back to the castle.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Time After Time - Wilhelmina uses a magic hourglass to go back in time and try - over and over - to steal Dorothy's ruby slippers. But every time she gets close to the slippers, Toto thwarts Wilhelmina's plans.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Kitten Around - Lion adopts a stray kitten, but when Dorothy returns the cat to her family, they find that Purrville is being terrorised by a Rak! To make the town safe, Dorothy must find a way to get rid of the Rak.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Castle Sitters - Wilhelmina sends her Monkeys to steal the Great Book of Ozian Records so she can erase Dorothy from Oz history! But Scarecrow, Tin Man and Lion are castle sitting, and the Monkeys are in for a fight.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Stuck On You - Dorothy gives Ozma a 'Best Friends' necklace (half says 'best' and the other half says 'friends') that she found in her garden. But the second they put on the necklace, they're joined at the hip!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Family Matters - Dorothy and friends help Woozy find his family, but when their attempts go awry, Woozy bursts into tears, creating a raging river that's sweeping through Oz! Now they realise they're a family!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Emerald Of Zog - Dorothy and friends are looking for a replacement emerald for Ozma's magic wand when they are captured by ZOG, a sea monster, and taken to his under water kingdom.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Cooking Up Some Magic - It's Cookie Eating Day and Dorothy must whip up enough cookies for all of Oz. Dorothy uses a magical baking pan. But in addition to multiplying the cookies, it also brings them to life.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Copy Cat - Wilhelmina steals Ozma's copy cat and makes clones of herself to storm the Emerald Castle demanding the ruby slippers. For Dorothy to combat all the Wilhelminas, she makes a fake pair of ruby slippers and lures them to the Truth Fountain.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Snow Place Like Home - When Queen Ozma shakes her magic snow globe, a snow cloud descends on Oz and for the first time it snows. The Ozians love the snow until it gets colder and shows no sign of letting up. Dorothy and friends must find a way to end the winter.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Mirroer Madness - Wilhelmina steals Queen Ozma's magic mirror and becomes so infatuated with her own reflection she gives up on her other hobbies. The more she looks in the mirror, the bigger her reflection grows

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Everything's Coming Up Poppies - It's the Poppin' Poppies Parade and Dorothy needs poppies to cover her float. But the poppy field has been picked dry, save for one poppy. Dorothy uses a plant grow potion on the poppy but this is the last of the Wicked Witch's sleeping poppies!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep31
programme.desc: A Cut Above The Rest - Ozma is helping Dorothy get ready for the Oz Royal Ball. Dorothy's worried about remembering all the protocols for meeting the royals but Patchwork Girl can make a magic dress that will take care of the protocol for her.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Abraca-Oops - When Ozma is practicing magic and can't remember the magic word, Dorothy yells Abracadabra. In Oz, that magic word actually takes magic away. It lasts one day. Too bad today is the magic contest where wizards and witches come for a competition.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Halloween Heist - Dorothy teaches her friends about Halloween and Wilhelmina thinks this sounds like the perfect holiday. Wilhelmina is going to hijack Halloween! She creates Jack Pumpkinhead to help her play a trick on Dorothy.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Haunt Me Not - It's Halloween night and Dorothy and crew are trick or treating when they come to the end of the Yellow Brick Road. Dorothy convinces them to follow the Red Brick Road instead. Their journey leads to a haunted house.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Wheelers Of Fortune - Bricks are disappearing from the Yellow Brick Road. When Dorothy and her friends follow the wheel prints back to the Wheelers hideout, they find Rustle has been stealing the bricks to cover up the fact his back wheel is broken.

programme.title: We Bare Bears: The Movie
programme.desc: When the bears' love of food trucks and viral videos gets out of hand, the menacing Agent Trout from the National Wildlife Control pledges to restore the 'natural order' by separating them forever.

programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling like her life has plateaued, a young woman finds herself unexpectedly spending the holiday with her ex and her eccentric family.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Chupaca-Bro - Team Tennyson discovers that a small village's goats are being terrorized by the legendary Chupacabra, but when Ben realizes it's actually Dr. Animo, our hero must thwart the dastardly doctor before he uses the essence of the goats to power up into an unstoppable form!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Buggy Out - After winning a Sumo Slammers Champion belt, Ben returns to the Rustbucket to find his prize in the arms of Kevin, but when his rival hijacks the Rustbuggy instead, our hero must stop at nothing to get back what's rightfully his!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Introducing Kevin 11 - At a local swap meet, Ben instead sets his sights on a Sumo Slammer collectible, but when Kevin takes it for himself, our hero must get it back by overcoming Kevin's secret weapon: an 11th alien!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Four By Four - During their visit to Twin City, Ben and Gwen sign up for some Laser Town awesomeness, but when Ben is teamed up with Kevin, the two must overcome their differences if they are to end up on top!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Cirque Us - After saving a State University Alumni ribbon cutting ceremony, Ben becomes the guest of honor at the upcoming Gala, but when the cirque entertainment turns out to be Zombozo-in-disguise, Ben must not only defeat the evil clown but his mysterious new sidekick: Pirouette!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Sword, The Fox And The Scooby Doo! - When our mystery solving gang is driving in Japan they are stopped by none-other than famous actor Mark Hamill.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep17
programme.desc: One Minute Mysteries! - Scooby and Shaggy love hanging out with The Flash.

programme.desc: Hollywood Knights! - The gang investigate a haunted mansion in Hollywood.

programme.desc: I Wish I Got The Credit I Deserve - While Daniel struggles to understand his daughters new vocation, Ruby embarks on a scientific wish that helps bring father and daughter to a meeting of the minds.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: A young boy discovers the secret headquarters of the worlds most powerful superhero hidden beneath his home and must defend it with his group of friends when villains attack.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A rescue pilot and his estranged wife embark on a treacherous journey to save their daughter after a catastrophic earthquake.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Forever Road - During a drag race, Ben hopes to stay neck and neck with Vin Ethanol and La Grange as XLR8, but when his watch keeps shorting out, our hero must get creative if he is to keep up with his fast and furious foes!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep32
programme.desc: The Bentathlon - After stuffing their faces with gyros, Team Tennyson makes their way to the real Greece in the Omni-Copter, but when they are suddenly captured by the Forever Knight mid-flight, Ben ends up in a coliseum, where he is pit against old foes: Iron Kyle, Queen Bee, and the Ground Hawgs!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep33
programme.desc: Prey Or Play - After receiving a super-exclusive ticket to Adrenaland, Ben leaves behind Grandpa Max and Gwen to enjoy the perks of being the parks only attendant, but when he learns he's not alone, our hero must now contend with the only kid who could afford the price of admission: Billy Billions!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep34
programme.desc: The Claws - While taking in the sights and sounds of a Rio de Jenaro music festival, Ben bristles at Gwen's suggestion that she be his new sidekick, but when the festival is threaten by the supersonic sound waves of Lord Decibel, our hero must lean on help from some familiar faces: DJ Gpa and Gwen-Cat!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Scare-Crow - During a visit to the farm of Penny Bennyson's grandfather, Team Tennyson is constantly haunted by a Scare-Crow that's come to life, our hero must defeat Aristocrow's master.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The New York Underground! - Shaggy is a bit of a poet (but only when no one is around).

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Fear Of The Fire Beast! - In Sicily, the gang are chasing a fire monster!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Too Many Dummies! - When Scooby and the gang are hired to escort a possessed ventriloquist dummy, they meet up with the two judges of the competition, Jeff Dunham and Darci Lynne Farmer.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Sister Sister - Glinda the Good's twin sister plans to displace Glinda as the most loved witch in Oz. Melinda thinks being good can't be hard. When each of Melinda's good deeds shows her true colors, Dorothy and the gang figure out there is an imposter.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Moody Magic - Wilhelmina finds a magical mood ring, which she uses to control Dorothy's mood and turn her evil. Wilhelmina might get those ruby slippers if Dorothy doesn't figure out she can overcome the powers of the ring by acting better than she feels

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep38
programme.desc: If The Shoe Fits - Wilhelmina uses a spell to get one of Dorothy's ruby slippers. When she tries to use the slipper, she's whisked away to Under the Rainbow. Dorothy and friends must follow Wilhelmina and reclaim the ruby slipper.

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep3

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Crossing - The group faces the harrowing task of crossing the river with their wagons and supplies. Thomas and Noemi grow closer.

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Fangs of Freedom - Shea and Thomas cope with the aftermath of the river crossing, but there is little time to grieve and no shortage of challenges ahead. Elsa and Ennis share a romantic moment.

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Boring The Devil - Shea helps Elsa cope with her loss. The group crosses another river and prepares to enter Indian territory. Thomas buys Noemi a gift.

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Lightning Yellow Hair - Elsa makes an unlikely friend. The group faces a harrowing challenge from mother nature. The camp searches for one of their own.

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Weep of Surrender - Elsa makes a big decision. Shea faces doubts as winter looms.

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Racing Clouds - A misunderstanding leads to a battle with serious consequences.

programme.title: 1883 S1 Ep10
programme.desc: This Is Not Your Heaven - James and Margaret face a heavy decision. Shea and Thomas take bold action to help one of their own.

programme.desc: When a woman claims that she is willing to work as a paid escort to cover her overdue bills, a generous friend steps up to help her. A woman sends thousands to a man she has never met in person.

programme.title: The Wedding March
programme.desc: After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A mild-mannered guy who is engaged to a monstrous woman meets the woman of his dreams , and schemes to find a way to be with her.

programme.title: The Choice is Yours
programme.desc: The story of Andre 'Dres' Titus, legendary frontman of Hip-Hop duo, Black Sheep. Dres embarks on a quest to make a new album using J Dilla's lost beats.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Strange New Worlds - When one of Pike's officers goes missing while on a secret mission for Starfleet, Pike has to come out of self-imposed exile.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Children of the Comet - While on a survey mission, the U.S.S. Enterprise discovers a comet is going to strike an inhabited planet. They try to re-route the comet, only to find an ancient alien relic buried on the its icy surface.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ghosts of Illyria - The U.S.S. Enterprise encounters a contagion that ravages the ship. One by one, the entire crew is incapacitated except for Number One, Una Chin-Riley, who must now confront a secret she's been hiding.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Memento Mori - While on a routine supply mission to a colony planet, the U.S.S. Enterprise comes under an attack from an unknown malevolent force.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep5

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Lift Us Where Suffering Cannot Reach - A threat to an idyllic planet reunites Captain Pike with the lost love of his life. To protect her and a scientific holy child from a conspiracy, Pike offers his help.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Serene Squall - While on a dangerous humanitarian mission, the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise stumbles into a harrowing game of leverage with the quadrant's deadliest space pirate.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Elysian Kingdom - The U.S.S. Enterprise becomes stuck in a nebula that is home to an alien consciousness that traps the crew in a fairy tale.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds S1 Ep9

Each week, a group of Makers from all over the country will compete in two handmade projects one timed, the other themed cleverly designed by Amy and Nick to test the Makers' ability to get creative. Each challenge will bring out their skills and insights, as well as their touching personal stories and, of course, plenty of laughter and fun for everyone. Then, in the end, one talented artisan will be crowned "Master Maker."

programme.title: DOA: Dead Or Alive
programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Pixels

programme.title: Chosen

programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the centers release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things dont go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascars species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Madagascar in Cold Blood Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the lives of Madagascars cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Tides of Sweetwater Ep5
programme.desc: A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1

programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Coopers hawk whos taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centres skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals stinky natural defences.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Village Raiders Ep6
programme.desc: Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Elephant Rescue Ep1
programme.desc: When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and trasported to a purpose-build nursery. But it won't be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Camp Phoenix Herd Ep2
programme.desc: Camp Phoenix in Zambias Kafue National Park is elephant heaven. Here a herd of orphan elephants are being given another chance. Their human carers teach them the skills theyll need to join an elephant herd in the wild.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Predators Uncovered Ep3
programme.desc: In the heart of the Zambian bush is a unique and special place. A beautiful Valley, bursting with life. It is home to a rich and diverse array of wildlife and is one of the last remaining strongholds for some of Africa's most endangered large carnivores.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Return of Hunters Ep4
programme.desc: Liuwa Plains National Park is a vast uncharted sea of golden grassland in the heart of Southern Africa. Remote and wild, it was once home to huge grazing herds of wildebeest and zebras, with predators such as lions and cheetahs lurking in the long grass. When civil war came to neighboring Angola, the abundant wildlife of Liuwa was quickly decimated by poachers, and for many years the park lay in a dormant, almost lifeless state. Peace has now returned and this film follows an extraordinary band of conservationists who are working to restore Liuwa to its former glory.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Anja Mountain Ep1
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, castaway creatures found themselves stranded on Madagascars rugged shores. Isolated from the mainland, the newcomers were left to evolve. This is a magical world of rare and unique creatures perfectly adapted to their tropical hideaway.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Madagascar Ep2
programme.desc: The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Wanderers of the Lost Forest Ep3
programme.desc: This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 - Emerald Season Ep1

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 - After the Rains Ep2

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Devon Island - Land of Ice Ep2

programme.desc: Run For The Border - When King Julien hosts the ultimate party, his Boom Box breaks, the kingdom becomes too crowded and he builds a giant wall to surround the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep40
programme.desc: The All Hail King Julien Show - King Julien launches a new TV channel called Julien-Vision but quickly realizes that the kingdom only wants to watch a reality show of his own life

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast and the Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protg./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep30
programme.desc: Galapagos a Go-Go - When Odlulu uses the Become an Animal Key to transform herself into different animals, she accidentally disrupts the Galapagos Islands animal populations. It's up to Wally, Wenda, Edmund and Hillary to protect the Galapagos from Odlulu's creature chaos.
