programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep128
programme.desc: My Cousin Chlo - Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure itout.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Sandcastle Calamity / Owl-Ert - Steel upsets a family of sand crabs when he makes a huge sandcastle for Stu and Safia. // Kai rushes through a voice-recognition upgrade on Janice and she ends up mistaking the hoots of a baby owl as commands from Alex, making his gadgets go crazy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save a Yodeler - When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader / Reindeer's Game / Short Kites - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy. // Bossy and Turtle get distracted by a video game and lost Roller's backpack. // Bossy and Turtle want to fly a kite but Bossy's room must be clean first.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Breaking the Ice - When a little bunny gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Robots to the Rescue - When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into super strong robots to save Axle City from a runaway train, an overflowing glue factory, and an erupting volcano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Trouble with Bunny Slugs - When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep408
programme.desc: T-Rex Trouble - Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Dad's Day Off / Scout's Honor / The Magic Word - Bossy and Bissy run errands with Dad. // Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help. // Bossy and Turtle learn about the word "please".

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Going Off With A Bang / Talent For Trouble - Steel and the Deer Squad want to organise a surprise party for Professor Scratch's birthday but the twins almost ruin the party. // To win the big talent show, Stu and Safia get Professor Scratch to programme Dinobot to obey their every command.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lil' Kimchi King and Kween / Don't Go Miss Elky / Doctor Chipper - Turtle wants to win a contest but he's up against Honey Bear. // When Bossy thinks Miss Elky is planning to leave forever, he tries to convince her to stay. // Bossy Turtle and Roller helps Chipper face her fear of going to the doctor's.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Toms's Birthday Surprise / Family Treasure Hunt - Santiago, Lorelai and Abuelo traverse treacherous waters to bring Toms a special birthday surprise. // It's a good ol' fashioned family competition as everyone pairs up to find the fabled treasure of La Caverna Secreta.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Lost Girl in a Canoe - The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Meatball Mayhem - When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Robots in Space - When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Life with Chumby - When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Power Tires - When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze / Squid N' Playl / Board to Tears - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day. // Bossy and Turtle invite Saddiq to take part in International Bestie Day traditions. // When Turtle gets a new skateboard, he's too scared to use it when Bossy has an accident.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat Family / Pups Save a Mud Monster - A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save Rocket Ryder - The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep28
programme.desc: The Space Badge - Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep29
programme.desc: The Harvest Badge - Duggee is getting ready to harvest the ripe crops that grown. The squirrels remember when they planted their seeds, watered them, and left them to grow, and now it's time to help Duggee pick them all.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Colour Badge - Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book, and the Squirrels want to join in.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Paper - Kit and Pup are making things out of paper. Pup loves to make origami animals, but Kit is frustrated that her creations don't turn out as perfectly as his.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Flower - Dee encourages a friend to say 'flower' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a pink flower, a yellow flower, a frilly flower and silly squirty flowers too!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Hidey Hup - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They enjoy going on the Tubby Bouncy, the Tubby Uppy Downy, the Tubby Spinny and the Tubby Slidey.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ready Steady Go! - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and do some exercise.

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Medal - Major gives three froglets medals for helping him, but the other froglets are jealous.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Say Cheese - Mae-Mae accidentally loses Phoebe's special photo album and must use Zip's camera to replace it.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Room to Dance - A Citizen Po can't help bumping into the furniture of his little house as he practices his dancing.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Rumbly Tummy - Messy's tummy is rumbling and so is Lofty the giant's! Luckily the gang are hungry to solve this scientific mystery.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Rub-A-Dub Messy - When Messy and friends discover how levers work, farmyard animal bath time commences with a splash!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep30
programme.desc: The Queen - Monty wonders whether the Queen has perfect manners all the time, or whether even royalty slip up now and then.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep19

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep20
programme.desc: It's Time to Explore the Park - JoJo and Gran Gran have a relaxing yoga class with Auntie Dee before using their senses to enjoy a day at the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Duck's Quack - Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop when Duck loses his quack.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Rainbow's Niece - Sarah's new colour wheel reminds Rainbow that he has not seen his niece in a while.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep19
programme.desc: Too Loud, Thomas! - After Thomas loses his voice, he must find a new way to pass on a very important message.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep18
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Max and Monty's antics on a construction site get them into trouble.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Pan-American Highway, Panama - The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Daylesford Long House Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Brisbane based architects Donovan Hill, helped Trace and Ronnen create the most original grand design, incorporating a giant greenhouse that encloses a house, garden, stables and animal pens.

programme.title: Road Kill Warriors
programme.desc: 400,000 animals are killed on Tasmanian roads every year. That's 45 every hour. Meet the women who have decided that enough is enough and are tackling this issue in unique and sometimes controversial ways.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Opening Round - Gold Coast Suns v Richmond Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - An Opening Round doubleheader begins with the Gold Coast Suns hosting the Richmond Tigers. Former Richmond Premiership coach Damien Hardwick is coaching his first match for the Suns against his former team.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Opening Round - GWS Giants v Collingwood Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The GWS Giants host the Collingwood Magpies in Saturday Night Football to conclude the AFL's special Opening Round for 2024.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 35 - Sophie visits a philanthropic propagator; Hannah delves into cold frames; Jerry rises to greener heights; Jane peers behind the camera; Tammy crafts a leafy piece of art; and we meet a family who garden and grow together.

programme.title: Osher Gunsberg: A Matter Of Life And Death
programme.desc: In this one-off documentary film, Australian celebrity Osher Gunsberg investigates how new science, innovative thinking and technology are helping prevent suicide.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Andrea Nierhoff presents a weekly roundup of world news. Nikki Haley quits the race for the White House, Chelsea FC comes out in support of striker Sam Kerr, and France enshrines the right to abortion in its constitution.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Michael Rowland, Bridget Brennan and the team hear from US singer Teddy Swims, The Veronicas, comedian Amy Hetherington, Olympic hopeful and breaker Rachael Gunn plus new releases and Oscar predictions from Zak Hepburn.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Food Trail Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Luke hits the ground running in Hong Kong to find the best food the city has to offer.

programme.title: Our Law
programme.desc: At Western Australia's first Indigenous run Police Station, two Noongar officers must learn Yarnangu Lore and master the Ngaanyatjarra language, if they are to effectively police one of the most remote beats in the world.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe Biden delivers his State of the Union Address to a joint session of Congress. Plus key takeouts from Super Tuesday and Nikki Haley drops out of the presidential race leaving Trump the likely Republican nominee.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Rolfe's media 'friend'; Gut balloon; Alleged kidnapping; Sky News kayfabe.

programme.title: Stories Of Bike - Journey Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Follow the journeys of three Australian motorcyclists; Maria's getaway with her best friend, Jonathan and his 18 month ride around the world and Jodie and her quest to make motorcycling a bigger part of her life.

programme.title: Tech Smart Agriculture - Pest Tech Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2022 - Fruit flies are one of Australia's most destructive and costly pests. But a new high-tech trap using the same technology as the fingerprint ID on a smart-phone, promises to reduce chemical use.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Max Chandler-Mather and Mike Zorbas Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Max Chandler-Mather, Federal MP for Griffith and Mike Zorbas, Chief Executive of the Property Council of Australia, address the National Press Club on the topic of "The Housing Crisis".

programme.title: Landline Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Scaling up production to get more jackfruit onto plates, and the entrepreneurial farmer determined to stay on his remote property despite incredible adversity.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Growing pains as households cut back spending and the economy sputters to a near halt. Plus more winners than losers as Reporting Season surprises on the upside. Presented by Rachel Pupazzoni.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The flames are out but the hard work continues for firefighters in Victoria's central west. Plus the sport of woodchopping moves to a new source of timber to keep the competitions viable. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Chris Bowen - Climate Change and Energy Minister Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers joins Jennifer Hewett, Anna Henderson and Peter Hartcher to discuss the Coalition's plans for nuclear energy in Australia, the ASEAN Summit, Keating on national security and China plus the Greens housing policy.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Kelli Underwood and the panel Caroline Wilson, Waleed Aly and Ryan Hoffman discuss the shock allegations against Sam Kerr, the start of the AFL season, the Second Cricket Test in NZ and the merits of the NRL's Vegas trip.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Tiana and Sam join Rugby League international Tinirau Arona covering the NRL season opener in Las Vegas, classification for aspiring para-athletes, and Kiribati track and field athlete Tauro Tiaon pursing his Olympic dream.

programme.title: ABC News Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Dan Bourchier presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Michael Rowland, Bridget Brennan and the team hear from US singer Teddy Swims, The Veronicas, comedian Amy Hetherington, Olympic hopeful and breaker Rachael Gunn plus new releases and Oscar predictions from Zak Hepburn.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Dan Bourchier presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Andrea Nierhoff presents a weekly roundup of world news. Nikki Haley quits the race for the White House, Chelsea FC comes out in support of striker Sam Kerr, and France enshrines the right to abortion in its constitution.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 35 - Sophie visits a philanthropic propagator; Hannah delves into cold frames; Jerry rises to greener heights; Jane peers behind the camera; Tammy crafts a leafy piece of art; and we meet a family who garden and grow together.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Tallebudgera Old Queenslander Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - A discarded 100-year-old Queenslander home is split into pieces and moved 140km on separate trucks to be reconstructed on a plot in the Gold Coast hinterland.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - French Island Barge Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Inventor Mike Gearon puts his creative skills to the test when he takes on a massive project - to build a American style ranch house including a great hall - for him and wife Debbie on Victoria's pristine French Island.

programme.title: Aussie Mavericks - Self-Made Woman Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - From sheep breeder to shearer, grain trader to truck driver. She was raised to be a wife and mother. Instead, this woman has set up more businesses and tackled more jobs than many people do in a lifetime.

programme.title: Wang Gungwu Lecture 2024
programme.desc: Business trailblazer Ming Long AM delivers the 2024 Wang Gungwu Lecture. Each year the lecture celebrates the life and work of a prominent Chinese Australian.

programme.title: Landline Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Preserving farming land in a tourism mecca; Farmers reaping the rewards of taking water security into their own hands; the AFL superstar balancing footy and farming; plus a microscopic view of the tiny but mighty ant.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The flames are out but the hard work continues for firefighters in Victoria's central west. Plus the sport of woodchopping moves to a new source of timber to keep the competitions viable. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Back Roads - East Arnhem Land, NT (Part 1) Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Rae Johnston discovers a remote and tiny community that punches above its weight on the international stage, in music, art, science, politics and culture - all while tackling a growing environmental and ecological crisis.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep70
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you the latest news and original reporting on the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chef Khanh Ong journeys to the coastal town of Port Lincoln in South Australia to unlock the secrets of the local seafood. Khanh learns how to trawl for wild prawns, harvest oysters and forages for unique coastal ingredients.

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - The participants put on a big show at the retirement village, they're retested by the experts to find out if their wellbeing has improved, and we see how their friendships are flourishing months later. (Season Final)

programme.title: Abebe - Butterfly Song
programme.desc: An exploration and celebration of the enduring cross-cultural friendship between Papua New Guinea's most celebrated singer-songwriter George Telek and acclaimed Australian musician David Bridie.

programme.title: Back Roads - Rabaul, Papua New Guinea Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - For the first time, Back Roads leaves Australian shores and travels to our closest northern neighbour, Papua New Guinea. Guest presenter Tania Bale introduces us to Rabaul, a community with close ties to Australia.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Kamahl Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - As a young migrant plagued by self-doubt, Kamahl put his sense of inferiority aside to make his name in showbusiness, going on to sell millions of records around the world. How will Anh interpret his charm and gentle wisdom?

programme.title: Hannah Gadsby's OZ Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Through a re-examining of colonial era paintings, Hannah sees that White Australia's sense of 'belonging' has a complex and troubled past. (Part 1 of 3)

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Annette Rypalski Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Meet biodiversity director Annette Rypalski, who looks after the rare and endangered animals living at Victoria's Mt Rothwell sanctuary.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Spring arrives late in eastern Hokkaido. Travel from Obihiro through Japan's food base and along the Pacific Ocean to Nemuro. Taste local delicacies, drive a train, and explore the vast marshlands.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Hyper-modern Japanese kitchens are compact, comfortable spaces for cooking and eating. We look at the history and evolution of this space at the heart of every Japanese home.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Staging Shared Memories
programme.desc: Summer 2023. In Fukushima, writer Yu Miri and local young people create a play linking past and future based on the effects of the 2011 Earthquake, the nuclear power plant accident and COVID-19.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Barakan Discovers Tohoku
programme.desc: North-east Japan has a long history of disasters, famines, ghosts, and a belief in the deceased "living with the living." How do residents have incorporated the loss of loved ones into their future?

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Spring arrives late in eastern Hokkaido. Travel from Obihiro through Japan's food base and along the Pacific Ocean to Nemuro. Taste local delicacies, drive a train, and explore the vast marshlands.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: In Japan, sweet potatoes are often baked or turned into sweets. But they can also be used to generate electricity or protect from heat. We introduce the diverse ways in which they are used and sold.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream
programme.desc: This episode features a miniature moon-going robot developed by a toy manufacturer and a business that is using satellite data to help Japanese farmers improve their harvests.

programme.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: Let'S Enjoy Math
programme.desc: Numbler erases a part of a cake delivery memo, resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one. Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: The 2011 earthquake and tsunami left a legacy of depopulation across much of Japan's northeast. Mapping recent demographic change reveals the towns employing fresh ideas to once again attract growth.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Samurai Chonmage Truth
programme.desc: The chonmage is the distinctive hairstyle of the samurai. Through interviews and experiments, we set out to discover the truth about when and how it came into being.

programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Voices Of Tohoku
programme.desc: Ever since the Great East Japan Earthquake and Tsunami, an NHK program has been recording the candid thoughts of survivors. We listen to their voices and examine the idea of "reconstruction."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Twelve years after a massive quake and tsunami in northeast Japan, we followed taxi drivers in Kesennuma, one of the affected towns, to experience people's memories and hopes through their eyes.

programme.title: National Treasure: The Golden Hall
programme.desc: A "total golden hall" suddenly appears in a remote place, Hiraizumi Town, Iwate Prefecture. 3DCG has made it possible to learn new facts that were previously unknown even to experts.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Crests are symbols of families and organizations. Once the privilege of the imperial and samurai classes, they were adopted by merchants and the populace as marks of pride.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: A mother and her two daughters go treasure hunting for maple trees in Shimukappu. Their goal is to obtain the syrup the trees produce. They also make traditional sweets from freshly-made maple syrup.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: This program is an animation series about a Japanese dog, Charo. He meets and is helped by many mythical creatures of Northern Japan as he searches for eight star talismans. Tohoku series 1-9.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at wasabi, an eye-watering condiment with many surprising uses.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Follow a kitty around a World Heritage Site! At a 125-year-old sake brewery, a patrol kitty makes his rounds before relaxing in the adjacent garden next to a lovely fresh water pond.

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals

programme.desc: Nikko, in Tochigi Prefecture, is home to much natural beauty with its great mountains and lakes. The ornate Nikko Toshogu Shrine is famous. See the widely beloved Nikko through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese

programme.desc: Numbler hides the measuring stick at a shoe shop so that a customer's foot cannot be measured. Barky realizes that the measurement can be made by counting how many 1-centimeter items are needed.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev
programme.desc: Prelims - The heavyweights take center stage at the APEX on Sunday, March 3, when unbeaten rising star Shamil Gaziev looks to smash his way into the Top 15 when he faces noted knockout artist Jairzinho Rozenstruik in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in 12 pro fights, Bahrains Gaziev kept the momentum going from his win on Dana Whites Contender Series with a knockout of Martin Buday, and now hell tackle the equally imposing Rozenstruik, who has scored knockouts in all seven of his UFC wins, stopping Junior Dos Santos, Alistair Overeem and Andrei Arlovski in the process

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.
